short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multifunctional, calm and beautiful new tab extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An enhanced start page for chrome.
Features:
* Keep your default Chrome functionality
* Easily and quickly access Bookmarks, History, Open-Tabs, and Downloads.
* Enhanced search- quickly find pages from history, open tabs, downloads and bookmarks
* Sticky notes
* Beautiful calming background 
* Light and dark theme
